text:
Hello,

I have installed a apache server, an PHP Server on my Home PC, and when I try to
start the apache server come´s this error:

[Mon Jun 11 06:41:32 2007] [notice] Apache/2.2.4 (Win32) configured -- resuming
normal operations
[Mon Jun 11 06:41:32 2007] [notice] Server built: Jan  9 2007 23:17:20
[Mon Jun 11 06:41:32 2007] [notice] Parent: Created child process 2820
[Mon Jun 11 06:41:32 2007] [notice] Child 2820: Child process is running
[Mon Jun 11 06:41:32 2007] [notice] Child 2820: Acquired the start mutex.
[Mon Jun 11 06:41:32 2007] [notice] Child 2820: Starting 250 worker threads.
[Mon Jun 11 06:41:32 2007] [notice] Child 2820: Starting thread to listen on
port 80.
[Mon Jun 11 07:06:24 2007] [notice] Parent: Received restart signal --
Restarting the server.
httpd.exe: Syntax error on line 67 of C:/Programme/Apache Software
Foundation/Apache2.2/conf/httpd.conf: Cannot load C:/PHP/php5apache2.dll into
server: Das angegebene Modul wurde nicht gefunden.  
[Mon Jun 11 07:06:25 2007] [warn] (OS 995)Der E/A-Vorgang wurde wegen eines
Threadendes oder einer Anwendungsanforderung abgebrochen.  : winnt_accept:
Asynchronous AcceptEx failed.
[Mon Jun 11 07:06:25 2007] [notice] Child 2820: Released the start mutex
[Mon Jun 11 07:06:26 2007] [notice] Child 2820: Waiting for 250 worker threads
to exit.
[Mon Jun 11 07:06:26 2007] [notice] Child 2820: All worker threads have exited.
[Mon Jun 11 07:06:26 2007] [notice] Child 2820: Child process is exiting

I Have checked, the File is into the order what can I do now?


Sorry for my Bad English, but im German.



Greets 

Tobias Goth
creator: tobi@killer.ath.cx
rpluem@apache.org
text:
Is your php binary (php5apache2.dll) compiled against 2.2.x? You cannot use a
php binary that is compiled against any older version (1.3.x / 2.0.x).
